question.title: How to solve this problem in the addon instalation in Hybris?
question.body:
I try install a custom addon in Hybris 2211-32 that as follow way:

ant addoninstall -Daddonnames="googletagmanager" -DaddonStorefront.yacceleratorstorefront="mabedib2bacceleratorstorefront"

But ends to build the installation i get the next error message:

BUILD FAILED C:\B2B_develop\hybris\bin\modules\core-accelerator\deprecated\addonsupport\resources\addonsupport\ant\acc-ant-addons.xml:730: The following error occurred while executing this line: C:\B2B_develop\hybris\bin\modules\core-accelerator\deprecated\addonsupport\resources\addonsupport\ant\acc-ant-addons.xml:644: The following error occurred while executing this line: C:\B2B_develop\hybris\bin\modules\core-accelerator\deprecated\addonsupport\resources\addonsupport\ant\acc-ant-addons.xml:648: The following error occurred while executing this line: C:\B2B_develop\hybris\bin\modules\core-accelerator\deprecated\addonsupport\resources\addonsupport\ant\acc-ant-addons.xml:321: project.properties.template file doesn't exist : C:\B2B_develop\hybris\bin\custom\googletagmanager/project.properties.template Total time: 5 seconds

In my addon directory i have the project.properties file, but i dont have idea becasue i get this error msg, anyone can to help me? I will be very grateful

answers.body:
It is clearly mentioned that project.properties.template file doesn't exist in your custom addon project googletagmanager.

Solution: create a new file named project.properties.template under googletagmanager addon.

Try to add that file the problem will be resolved.

Cheers

Bruce

79653753.body: OP clearly states that he DOES have the project.properties file in his addon directory. Please edit your answer by adding more details so others understand how this addresses the question asked.
